6. Continuous delivery (CD)¶

Prerequisite¶

  1. Uncomment the « deploy job » on .circleci/config.yml

  2. Sign up to Sentry to get the SENTRY_DSN, follow this tutorial

  3. Sign up to Render.

    1. CircleCI : Go on project settings >

    • variables d’environnement on circleci

  • variables d’environnement on RENDER

  • (SECRET_KEY, DATABASE_URL, SENTRY_DSN, ADMIN_PASSWORD)

  • sentry settings.production.py
